last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 10
last_episode_to_air.overview: There's drama at the park as Adam confronts the protesters about his building plans. But Lisa is having none of it.

name: Mount Pleasant
overview: The life of Mancunian Lisa and the day-to-day adventures she has with her husband, friends and family.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Lisa is convinced that Dan will forget their tenth wedding anniversary - Shelley is cross with Greg for sneaking back onto the slot machines again and Denise is trying her hand at dating after dumping Fergus. And Kate’s cafe on the high street opens for the first time – but there’s trouble with the loos so it’s not long before she’s enlisting Dan’s help.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Lisa's self-esteem takes a serious hit when her smock top is mistaken for a baby bump... Meanwhile, Kate is troubled by news that her husband's death is being investigated.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Dan is recovering from a hernia operation and it's up to an increasingly frazzled Lisa to run around after him. Elsewhere, Shelley confronts Greg about his gambling.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Lisa's looking for trouble when she asks Dan to pick his favourite part of her body. Plus, when Bianca throws a hot tub party, tensions bubble as much as the water.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Lisa catches Pauline enjoying a spot of shoplifting and decides to confront her. Elsewhere, Greg thinks he's found a solution to his financial woes in loan shark Emma.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Lisa and Dan are burgled, and are devastated to discover that their wedding photograph has been taken. Plus, Fergus demonstrates his knack for playing loose with the truth.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Barry and Sue prepare for their 40th anniversary, and Lisa tries but fails to keep up appearances. Elsewhere, Denise stays strong, and Greg is given yet more bad news.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: The day of Barry and Sue's anniversary party arrives, and Lisa and Dan are struggling to keep up the pretence that they are still a couple. Shelly has had enough of Greg's lies and talks to him about their future, while Denise decides she just wants to be alone - but is still flattered by the advances of a man in her birthing class. Last in the series.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: The down-to-earth comedy drama starring Sally Lindsay and Daniel Ryan makes a new home on Sky Living. In this opening fix, Lisa is led astray by a new friend.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Dan becomes jealous of Lisa’s friendship with Kim. The residents are forced pull together after tragedy strikes. Pauline receives a blast from her past.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Pauline is far from happy when Dan's dad, Charlie, turns up, insisting she won't let him back into her anytime soon. Meanwhile, there's a similarly unwelcome arrival at Reconnect for Lisa, and Fergus threatens new mum Denise with legal action.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: New resident Chris's arrival causes a stir in the street, arousing the interest of Bianca in particular. Meanwhile, Lisa's friendship with Kim continues to cause trouble; neither Dan nor Shelley are best pleased. Greg, on the other hand, is going from strength to strength.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: While Pauline and Charlie put their pasts behind them, Kim makes Lisa an offer she can't refuse. Plus, Barry hopes to find a way to ease Sue's irritations.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: As Lisa and Dan ride high on the excitement of their holiday, could there be more to the trip than meets the eye? Elsewhere, Denise drops a bombshell.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Kate hopes to make amends with her former friends, while Lisa plans a welcome home party for her parents. Is Chris and Bianca's attendance together a date?

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: The newly single Fergus tricks Denise into visiting him at his motel room, and as Lisa overcomes the past and forgives Kate.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Dan is shocked after Lisa invites Chris and Bianca over for a dinner party. Things end up gettinng worse after Kate shows up to help with the cooking.

episodes.name: Episode 10: Christmas Special
episodes.overview: There is not much festive cheer about and after disaster strikes at Bianca's everybody must come together to try and make it a Christmas everybody will remember.

episodes.name: Episode One
episodes.overview: Curtains twitch and chins wag on the Manchester cul-de-sac when London couple Bradley and Tanya move in. Not all is bliss however, as Lisa loses her job.

episodes.name: Episode Two
episodes.overview: Dressed to impressed, Lisa aims for the top of the career ladder, but a lack of formal qualifications is holding her back.

episodes.name: Episode Three
episodes.overview: Fergus ends up on dad duty while Denise gets her modelling career started, leaving Lisa to do all the graft setting up their first office.

episodes.name: Episode Four
episodes.overview: Games lead to little merrymaking for lovesick Gary, who uses a video-game to connect with Ella, and Greg is getting in too deep by working as a drug runner.

episodes.name: Episode Five
episodes.overview: It's the morning after the night before as Dan and Tanya face the repercussions of their misguided hotel shenanigans.

episodes.name: Episode Six
episodes.overview: Dan is in the dog house because of his bad behaviour. Lisa decides to sleep on Denise's sofa.

episodes.name: Episode Seven
episodes.overview: Pauline and Charlie both want to give single life a good send-off on their hen and stag dos. Nerves manage to set in though after the party plans are kept secret.

episodes.name: Episode Eight
episodes.overview: Charlie and Pauline get married once again.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: The cul-de-sac comedy drama returns as Lisa and Dan prepare for the imminent birth of their baby, while adjusting to the unexpected arrival of his wayward brother Robbie. Elsewhere, Greg is released from prison following his mix-up with drug dealers, Denise's modelling career takes off and Gary receives his A-level results. Sally Lindsay and Daniel Ryan star.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Lisa grapples with life as a stay-at-home mum, while Dan tries to uncover the real reason for Robbie's return and Bradley's crooked past catches up with him.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: The temperature rises on the close as Tanya and Greg become better acquainted and Lisa is fuming when she returns to work to find someone has filled her shoes.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: As Lisa's fight with Angie escalates and Dan is dragged to a car boot sale by his mum, the couple compete to see who has the worst day. Also, Tanya gets a scare.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: It's confession time for Robbie when Dan discovers the real reason for his return to Manchester. Plus, Fergus attempts to repair his relationship with Denise.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Lisa and Dan play peacemakers as they deal with the fallout from Robbie's revelations. Plus, after a day out with Barry, Denise makes a life-changing decision.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Barry resorts to drastic measures when kooky Pauline throws herself into granny duties. Dan, meanwhile, tries to prevent a liaison between Greg and Tanya.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: The tense series finale sees danger seize Mount Pleasant.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Lisa and Dan's marriage is far from stable and their problems are highlighted by the arrival of vivacious and very-much-in-love new neighbours Jenna and Cameron, with war immediately waged between the women. Elsewhere, Pauline attracts the attentions of pub owner Trevor, though there may be more to the ultra-suave landlord than meets the eye, while Roger and Fergus become unlikely gym buddies.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Dan and Cameron bravely attempt to establish some peace between Lisa and Jenna. Plus, the Dawsons are confronted by an all-too-familiar face from their past.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Dan starts to question new landlord Trevor's intentions towards his mother. Meanwhile, Lisa attempts to make the opening of her new office a day to remember.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Lisa attempts to outdo Jenna when they both throw birthday parties for their daughters on the same day. Greg tries to adjust to life with new flatmate Bradley.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Lisa and Dan attempt to patch things up with a date night, but things fail to go exactly as planned, while Pauline has a terrifying encounter with a burglar. Bradley tries to stop Ella from dating the Millers' bad-boy son Finn, not knowing that Jenna and Cameron disapprove too, Roger and Fergus start to train for their mini-marathon and Denise approaches her agent regarding the dubious nature of some of her recent modelling jobs.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Lisa and Jenna's ongoing feud reaches a head when an argument lands them behind bars, Trevor takes Pauline out for the night, and Roger's jealousy reaches new heights when he begins to believe that Fergus and his personal trainer are dating. Elsewhere, Ella and Finn begin to take their relationship to the next level and there are unforeseen consequences for Denise when she quits her agency, taking a new recruit with her.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: As her and Dan's marriage reaches crisis point, Lisa suggests they see a relationship counsellor, while Pauline decides to set the record straight following a stolen kiss with Trevor. Finn and Ella arrange to get away for the weekend, Denise helps Cazzy plan for her future and the day of Roger and Fergus's mini-marathon arrives.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: As the truth behind landlord Trevor's scheming is revealed, the residents of Mount Pleasant are thrown into grave danger.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: The new series kicks off with the opening of a revamped Dog and Dart pub, now under the ownership of Bradley, the former criminal, ex-husband to Tanya and the father of Ella. With this role, he has turned over a new leaf and promised Ella he will follow the right path. What could possibly go wrong?

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Pauline receives some heartbreaking news, while Roger begins his first day at work. Elsewhere, Ella finds out that Finn has quit his job and Adam Wyatt returns.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Lisa and Jenna's article is the talk of the town, while Dan struggles to know what to do with Pauline. Elsewhere, Denise and Ollie have their first date.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Ella reveals she's pregnant. But how will Finn react? Elsewhere, the petition to save the park is in full swing and Denise and Ollie go on a second date.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Barry is entrusted to hand out 'save the park' flyers but runs into trouble with Adam Wyatt. Later, Lisa hosts a dinner party but an unwelcome visitor turns up.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Bradley hopes he's seen the last of Denty, but gets a rude awakening. Meanwhile, the protest at the park gets into full swing. But it's not without drama.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: There's drama at the park as Adam confronts the protesters about his building plans. But Lisa is having none of it.
